long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension enhances the layout and functionality of cadetnet. It does this to help aid unit leaders administer their camps and personnel.

Current Functionality:
- (UTP) Pull exercise attending personal information into a spreadsheet.
- (ATP) Pull exercise attending personal information into a spreadsheet.
- (Attendance) Layout improvements.
- (Attendance) Paper roll button.
- (Reports Index) Export NOK details as a spreadsheet.
- (Attendance) Entered hours do not reset or get stuck between entries.
- (Notifications) Select all buttons now work.
- Better load screens
- Minor improved CSS layouts on certain pages

More functionality is coming...
